TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BitmapSource extends System.Windows.Media.ImageSource
Public MustInherit Class BitmapSource Inherits ImageSource
public ref class BitmapSource abstract : System::Windows::Media::ImageSource
type BitmapSource = class inherit ImageSource interface DUCE.IResource

summary.span: 表示在一定大小和分辨率下的单个恒定像素集。

span.span: Represents a single, constant set of pixels at a certain size and resolution.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 图像处理管道的基本构建基块，从概念上讲，以特定大小和分辨率指定一组固定的像素。 is the basic building block of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] imaging pipeline, conceptually representing a single, constant set of pixels at a certain size and resolution. 可以是解码器提供的图像文件中的单个帧，也可以是操作自身 的转换的结果。A could be a single frame in an image file that a decoder provides, or it could be the result of a transform that operates on a of its own. 不用于表示多帧图像或动画。 is not used to represent a multi-frame image or an animation. [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 本机支持 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_bmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bmp-md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)]和 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] 映像的压缩和解压缩。natively supports compression and decompression of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_bmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bmp-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] images. 对于位图解码方案， 会根据用户系统上安装的编解码器使用自动编解码器发现。For bitmap decoding scenarios, uses automatic codec discovery, based on the installed codecs on the user's system. 图像的最大高度和宽度是 2 ^ 16 像素，每通道32位，4通道。The maximum height and width of an image is 2^16 pixels at 32 bits per channel \* 4 channels. 的最大大小为 2 ^ 32 字节（64 gb），最大图像大小为四个 gigapixels。The maximum size of a is 2^32 bytes (64 gigabytes) and the maximum image size is four gigapixels. 最小图像大小为1x1。The minimum image size is 1x1. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 ，并将其用作 控件的源。The following code example demonstrates how to create a and use it as the source of an control. [!code-csharp[imagingsnippetgallery_procedural_snip#BitmapSourceCreate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImagingSnippetGallery_procedural_snip/CSharp/BitmapSourceExample.cs#bitmapsourcecreate)] [!code-vb[imagingsnippetgallery_procedural_snip#BitmapSourceCreate](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImagingSnippetGallery_procedural_snip/VB/BitmapSourceExample.vb#bitmapsourcecreate)] 下面的代码示例使用 派生类 从图像文件创建位图，并将其用作 控件的源。The following code example uses a derived class, , to create a bitmap from an image file and use it as the source of an control. [!code-csharp[imageelementexample#SimpleCSharp1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImageElementExample/CSharp/SimpleImageExample.xaml.cs#simplecsharp1)] [!code-vb[imageelementexample#SimpleCSharp1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImageElementExample/VB/SimpleImageExample.xaml.vb#simplecsharp1)]

span.span: Microsoft Windows Imaging Component
IWCBitmapSource

summary.span: 此方法用于确保像素复制操作的安全。

span.span: This method is used to make sure that pixel copying operations are safe.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法仅在以下情况下才会成功：将从源站点或在 `pack:`中定义的 传递给它。This method only succeeds if it is passed a that is from a site of origin or that is defined in a `pack:`. 在所有其他情况下，此方法将失败。In all other conditions, this method will fail.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于生成冻结 对象（或任何 对象）的可修改副本。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 为方便起见，此方法使用强类型实现隐藏了继承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由 方法调用，不应在代码中直接调用，除非在重写此方法时调用基实现。This method is called by the method and should not be called directly from your code, except when you call the base implementation while overriding this method. 若要创建当前对象的可修改副本，请调用 ，而不是直接调用此方法。To create a modifiable copy of the current object, call instead of calling this method directly. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable Custom Event DecodeFailed As EventHandler(Of ExceptionEventArgs)

summary.span: 在由于图像标题损坏而无法下载图像时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the image fails to load, due to a corrupt image header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage \<*对象*DecodeFailed = "*EventHandler*" .../>\<*object* DecodeFailed="*EventHandler*" .../>

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable Custom Event DownloadCompleted As EventHandler

summary.span: 在下载完位图内容时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the bitmap content has been completely downloaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能不会为所有类型的位图内容引发此事件。This event may not be raised for all types of bitmap content.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable Custom Event DownloadFailed As EventHandler(Of ExceptionEventArgs)

summary.span: 在无法下载位图内容时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the bitmap content failed to download.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能不会为所有类型的位图内容引发此事件。This event may not be raised for all types of bitmap content. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage \<*对象*DownloadFailed = "*EventHandler*" .../>\<*object* DownloadFailed="*EventHandler*" .../>

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable Custom Event DownloadProgress As EventHandler(Of DownloadProgressEventArgs)

summary.span: 在下载位图内容的进度有变化时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the download progress of the bitmap content has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能不会为所有类型的位图内容引发此事件。This event may not be raised for all types of bitmap content. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage \<*对象*DownloadProgress = "*EventHandler*" .../>\<*object* DownloadProgress="*EventHandler*" .../>
